title: Luxury Experience - Kailash Mansarovar
description: Premium luxury pilgrimage with helicopter access, private ceremonies, and personal spiritual guide. The ultimate comfort journey to the sacred mountain with luxury accommodations and exclusive services.

itinerary.title: Luxury Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: VIP arrival, luxury hotel accommodation, and personal briefing with spiritual guide.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Preparation Day
itinerary.description: Spiritual preparation, permit processing, and luxury shopping for the journey.

itinerary.title: Private Flight to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Private charter flight to Nepalgunj with luxury ground services.

itinerary.title: Helicopter to Simikot
itinerary.description: Private helicopter flight to Simikot with scenic mountain views.

itinerary.title: Simikot to Hilsa Border
itinerary.description: Luxury ground transport to Tibet border with VIP processing.

itinerary.title: Hilsa to Taklakot
itinerary.description: Cross into Tibet with expedited processing and luxury accommodation.

itinerary.title: Acclimatization in Taklakot
itinerary.description: Rest day with spa services and spiritual preparation.

itinerary.title: Taklakot to Mansarovar
itinerary.description: Luxury transport to sacred Lake Mansarovar with private ceremony.

itinerary.title: Sacred Mansarovar Experience
itinerary.description: Full day at Mansarovar with private spiritual ceremonies and meditation.

itinerary.title: Mansarovar to Darchen
itinerary.description: Luxury transport to Darchen with premium camping setup.

itinerary.title: Kailash Parikrama Day 1
itinerary.description: Begin sacred circumambulation with personal guide and support team.

itinerary.title: Kailash Parikrama Day 2
itinerary.description: Cross Dolma La Pass with helicopter support if needed.

itinerary.title: Kailash Parikrama Day 3
itinerary.description: Complete the sacred circuit and return to luxury base camp.

itinerary.title: Darchen to Taklakot
itinerary.description: Luxury return journey with celebration dinner.

itinerary.title: Taklakot to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: VIP border crossing and private flight back to Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Luxury departure services and blessed farewell.
